author: Ade Onibada
title: People Are Questioning Whether A London Park Should Close Because Of Sunbathers And Groups Gathering During The Coronavirus Outbreak
description: The closure of Brockwell Park during the Coronavirus outbreak has prompted a mixed response response, with some members of the public and political figures calling it the wrong decision. View Entire Post ›
content:
Lambeth councils decision to close Brockwell Park in response to the thousands of visitors it received on Saturday has prompted mixed responses, with some members of the public and political figures supporting it and others calling it the wrong decision.
